analyzed: de la chu snod dag ni phul nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: He first gave rise to bodhicitta.

original: bde gshegs sgra gcan phreng rgyu mkhan bu'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs sgra gcan phreng rgyu mkhan bu'i tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la //
translated: (1) The Sugata Ganiprabha first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a bath attendant🔽and offered bathing water🔽to the Tathagata known as Mind of Clarity.🔽(2) The Tathagata Brahmasvara first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a cowherd🔽and offered a measure of wheat🔽to the Tathagata known as Sweet Melody, when that Sugata first attained Buddhahood.🔽(3) The Sugata Drdhasamudgata first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was the son of a cowrie shell merchant🔽and offered a handful of cowrie shells

original: gser gyi mchil lham zung cig phul nas kyang //
analyzed: gser gyi mchil lham zung cig phul nas kyang //
translated: to the Sugata known as Proceeding Without Hindrance.🔽(4) The Sugata Sthitamatirbuddha first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a prince🔽and offered a parasol of gold🔽to the Tathagata known as Mind of Awareness.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: (5) The Sugata Sthitamatirbuddha first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a prince

original: bde gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur pa'i tshe //
translated: and offered a parasol of gold🔽to the Tathagata known as Mind of Awareness.

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad grags pa la // brang rtsir byas pa'i 'o ma dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs grags pa'i bshes gnyen tshong dbon gyi //🔽bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs bden tog la //
analyzed: bde gshegs grags pa'i bshes gnyen tshong dbon gyi // bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs bden tog la //

analyzed: da bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la //

analyzed: bde gshegs dka' thub chen po tshong dpon tshe //

translated: The Sugata Mahātapas first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a m erchant and offered a lamp to the Tathàgata known as Great Renown.

analyzed: rin chen yu bar bcas pa'i gdugs 'bum phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa ded dpon bur gyur tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa khod pa de la ni //
translated: The Sugata Merukira first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a chakravartin king and offered one h u n d red thousand parasols w ith jeweled handles to the Tathàgata known as Great M eru.

original: rin chen rnam bu lnga ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang //🔽dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: rin chen rnam bu lnga ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: The Sugata Gunakuta first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was the son of a m erchant and offered five jeweled canopies to the Tathagata known as Offering of Worship.

analyzed: bde gshegs mchod grags stsal chen lta bu'i bram ze'i tshe //

analyzed: dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin grong dpon tshe //
translated: The Tathagata Vidyunottama, when he was a village headman,🔽offered a cushion to the Tathagata known as Accomplished Purpose🔽and for the first time gave rise to bodhichitta.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i 'bras can phul nas kyang //
